name: Longship (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 5 miles per hour (120 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Longship (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.
